title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-3.2 - Emergencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-3.2 - Emergencies

State Regulations

The director shall have the authority to waive any of the prescribed requirements for admission when in his judgment an emergency exists requiring immediate admission of a patient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
88-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
